definition: printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: The Braille detection technology has been designed to work in both hardcopy and electronic environments.
sentences.chinese: 盲文檢測技術被設計爲工作在印刷版和電子環境。

sentences.english: You may want to print a hardcopy of this security FAQ page for reading offline.
sentences.chinese: 您可能需要打印脫機安全常見問題頁面閱讀的印刷版。

sentences.english: Using these methods and through the experiment. The authors analyze the resolution and the correct copy range of three types of offset plates.
sentences.chinese: 實驗分析了三類印刷版的分辨率和正確曬版範圍。

sentences.english: For accessing printed versions of Bank documents, the Bank operates the InfoShop.
sentences.chinese: 爲了提供印刷版文件，世行成立了信息處。

sentences.english: The above printed items are available while stock lasts.
sentences.chinese: 上述印刷版項目派完即止。

definition: paper/hard copy/printed (as opposed to electronically displayed)
